question: Scenario 3.1 The Furniture Emporium Inc. is a Canadian-based international manufacturer and distributor of high-end furniture for offices and homes. However, while these groups are well represented in the organization, they are not seen in the same percentage as a part of the senior management structure of the organization. choices: It is required by law in Canada.
